page.title: 20The Grove Today.
page.content: The two brand names introduced in autumn 1983 were Chukie and J.P.Woods of Shropshire.Some of the products include;frozen chickens,frozen turkeys,chicken portions,chicken and turkey roasts,chicken livers and turkey roll. The number of staff employed today is 1,400. Twenty million Chukie products are produced each year. Poults are baby turkeys and are reared by turkey farmers who want to sell them at Christmas.100,000 turkey poults are sold annually in Wales At the Grove youngsters from South Shropshire schools have been working alongside regular employees in a variety of jobs.
